dialog: Good day, wizard. I've been asked to negotiate the terms of our trade deal.
Yes, of course. I am ready to discuss the details. What do you propose?
I suggest that we use a spell of telepathy to transfer the payment directly to your account.
Interesting proposal, but what if the spell fails or is intercepted?
In that case, we have a backup plan. We can use a spell of invisibility to transport gold coins to your location.
I like the sound of that. It's always good to have a backup plan. What about the delivery date?
We can use a spell of teleportation to deliver the goods within 24 hours of the payment being received.
Excellent. Those terms sound fair to me. Let us cast the necessary spells and finalize the deal.
I heard rumors of a new wizard in town. Have you seen him yet?
No, I have not. What have you heard about this new wizard?
I've heard that he is incredibly powerful and that he can perform magic that no one has ever seen before.
Really? That's quite intriguing. I would love to see this new wizard in action.
I heard that he is also quite mysterious and that no one knows where he came from.
Interesting. It seems that this new wizard has many secrets to uncover.
Yes, I agree. Perhaps we should seek him out and ask for a demonstration of his powers.
I think that would be a wise idea. Let us set out on this quest and discover the truth about this mysterious new wizard.
Do you need a broomstick or a flying carpet to travel, wizard?
I prefer to use a flying carpet. It is faster and more comfortable for long journeys.
Very well, I will have one ready for you. Let us set off on our journey to find the new wizard.
